about.title: About Me
about.text:
Hi! My name is Karolina and I am really happy to see you here!

I'm a Front-End Developer with several years of experience in the field, specializing in the dynamic duo of TypeScript and React. My expertise in these technologies enables me to build highly interactive, robust, and efficient web applications to deliver the highest user experience.

Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work on a diverse range of web development projects, including building engaging, user-friendly websites, CMS platforms, and web applications. I am proficient with modern Front-End Development technologies and have a basic understanding of Back-End Development. This combination allows me to work effectively with cross-functional teams. I enjoy collaborating with other developers to create functional and visually appealing products. I strongly believe that teamwork is essential for success in any project.

I am passionate about bringing visions to life. Whether it's building a responsive application from scratch or optimizing an existing one, I'm committed to delivering high-quality and scalable code. I am eager for continuous learning and personal growth, and I am not afraid to take on any challenge.

If you are looking for a dedicated Front-End Developer to help bring your projects to life, please feel free to get in touch!

projectPage.title: Projects
projectPage.subtitle: During my professional career as a front-end developer, I participated in interesting and exiting projects. I'm thrilled to showcase some of my works, including projects that I've completed both as a part of a team and individually. Please take a moment to explore my portfolio and feel free to contact me if you have any questions or feedback. I look forward to discussing my work with you!

technologiesPage.subtitle: At the heart of my technology stack lies React.js - a popular and powerful framework allowing me to create responsive and complex user interfaces with ease. In addition, I am using a variety of other cutting-edge technologies that work very well with React.js.
